Articles.Content:
Today i got CKAN working and then i download some mods and then it says KSP install not found and the file path where KSP is C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program 

So i check the CKAN path for KSP and it's the same file path, so some help would be useful. THANK YOU

PS idk how to get screen shots in to this post srry
Do you have a readme file in your ksp folder? Because I think that's how CKAN checks for KSP installs. It may also have something to do with it being in C:\\Program Files

if you can get the CKAN screen up and running there is selection to specify the exact directory where your ksp installation is located.  First diagnostic step would be to verify that value is set correctly.

I've had similar issues and it was because I had multiple installs and my CKAN settings were not consistent - it was my own user issue (AKA fault).
Well the file path is my ksp install so now what
